# Gurtle plug-in parameters for TortoiseSVN

= Parameters =

When you configure a working copy path for Gurtle in the Issue Tracker Integration area of TortoiseSVN Settings, you will need to supply a values for the *Parameters* field:

http://tortoisesvn.net/docs/release/TortoiseSVN_en/images/SettingsIssueTracker.png

The parameters for Gurtle is a semi-colon delimited list of name and value pairs where each name and value paire are separated by an equal (=) sign. The syntax can be summarized as follows:

{{{
PARAMETERS = ( ";" NAME "=" VALUE ) *
PARAMETER  = NAME "=" VALUE
}}}

The possible values for NAME and VALUE are described in the table below:

|| NAME || VALUE ||
|| `project` || Name (always in lowercase) of the project hosted at Google Code. For the example, for the project at http://gurtle.googlecode.com/, the value would be for this parameter would be `gurtle`.  ||
